snippet: Two boys out collecting firewood with their donkeys were killed by weapons fired from a NATO helicopter, Afghan and American military officials announced on Saturday.
abstract: Two boys out collecting firewood with their donkeys are killed by weapons fired from NATO helicopter; Gen Joseph F Dunford Jr, new American commander in Afghanistan, promptly issues apology and says killings were an accident.

byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah contributed reporting from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: Two boys out collecting firewood with their donkeys were killed by weapons fired from a NATO helicopter, Afghan and American military officials announced on Saturday.

headline.main: Two Afghan Boys Accidentally Killed by NATO Helicopter
headline.print_headline: Two Afghan Boys Accidentally Killed by NATO Helicopter
